OrgName.entry: BRITISH RED CROSS, SOUTH YORKSHIRE BRANCH

Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides training in first aid to the public and industry, first aid cover for public events, transport for disabled and elderly people, skin camouflage, an International Tracing Service, a medical loan service (wheelchairs and commodes for a maximum of 4 weeks, as items needed for longer periods should be loaned from the local NHS), skilled and impartial care to people in need. Self or any referral.
